source.name: Question 6
source.instructions: Which of the following statements about Browser Contexts in Playwright is true?

answers.answer: Each Browser Context can have its own set of cookies, permissions, and state.
Browser Contexts are used to control and interact with the browser using code.
Browser Contexts are similar to Sessions, as they allow sharing data between different contexts.
Persistent Contexts are a type of Browser Context that only stays open temporarily.
